SummaryEnglish: Taking place many years after the events of Dragon Ball GT, the Z Fighters are called forth by a group of mysterious beings to help them face a powerful foe that has been causing havoc on Planet Namek.

1.SummaryEnglish: It has been 8 years since Goku left with Shenron after defeating the Shadow Dragons. Time of peace is about to be disturbed once more as a mysterious group approaches Earth. A new threat is upon the Z-fighters. Will they able to face this threat with Goku gone?

2.SummaryEnglish: After arriving on Namek, Gohan learns that the mysterious group is not to be trusted. The Z-fighters get scattered across Namek for each to fight their own battle.

3.SummaryEnglish: Pan and Bra muster all their strength to fight off their adversary. Meanwhile, Vegeta faces off against Broly, showing off his new found power.
